snippet: Defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul led the Giants with 16 ½ sacks last season, but opponents will be focusing on him in the coming N.F.L. season.
abstract: New York Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul led the team in sacks last season, and opponents will be focusing on him in the coming NFL season.
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul led the Giants with 16 ½ sacks last season, but opponents will be focusing on him in the coming N.F.L. season.

headline.seo: Giants Defensive End Pierre-Paul Is No Longer a Mystery
headline.main: A Giant’s Goal: Become Refined, but Not Too Fine
headline.print_headline: A Giant’s Goal: Become Refined, but Not Too Fine
